meanings.definition: A young salmon that has returned to freshwater after one winter at sea.
meanings.sent1: The grilses swam swiftly in the river.
meanings.sent2: We spotted a group of grilses jumping upstream.
meanings.sent3: The grilses played hide and seek among the rocks.
meanings.sent4: The grilses danced gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering grilses sparkled under the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: She counted the grilses in the fish tank.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught many grilses during the season.
meanings.sent3: The grilses looked like a school of tiny fish.
meanings.sent4: The grilses swam together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The colorful grilses added life to the aquarium.
